metamorphosis.title: Smile Metamorphosis
metamorphosis.subtitle: See the results of our specialists' work.
metamorphosis.shortDescription: A unique aesthetic transformation performed using modern porcelain veneers.
metamorphosis.longDescription: We present a detailed clinical case report. The patient presented with discoloration and irregularities of the front teeth. After consultation, it was decided to place 6 porcelain veneers in the upper arch. The entire process took only two visits and resulted in a natural, snow-white smile that completely transformed the patient's self-confidence.

appointment.title: Book Appointment
appointment.errorPastDate: You cannot select a date in the past.
appointment.errorPastTime: The selected time has already passed. Please choose another.

servicesPage.title: Your Smile, Our Passion
servicesPage.subtitle: From prevention to advanced transformation. We combine technological precision with gentle care to provide you with the smile you deserve.
servicesPage.contactUs: Contact us to learn more about our services and schedule an appointment.

header.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reject the system?

home.welcomeText: Professional dental care for you and your family

error.userDataIncorrect: Email address or password is incorrect. Please try again.
error.shortPassword: Hasło musi mieć co najmniej 6 znaków.

teamPage.normalInformation: We believe that dental treatment is not just about technology, but above all about relationships. Our team ensures that every visit takes place in a stress-free atmosphere, with a full understanding of your needs and anxieties.

about.aboutOurClinicText: More then 15 year of experience in helping your smile. Learn our story....
about.storyPart1: Dental Clinic was founded in 2008 with a mission to provide the highest quality dental care in a friendly and comfortable atmosphere. Over the years, we have grown by investing in the latest technologies and expanding our team with the best specialists.
about.storyPart2: Today, we are one of the leading dental clinics in the region, serving thousands of satisfied patients. Our experience, combined with a passion for dentistry, allows us to offer comprehensive services at the highest level.
about.storyPart3: We believe that everyone deserves a beautiful and healthy smile. That is why we constantly improve our skills and invest in modern equipment to provide our patients with the best possible care.
about.feedback2: The best dental clinic in town.

patientCare.title: Patient Care
patientCare.desc: Every patient is our top priority. We provide an individual approach and the highest quality of care.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.desc: Our team consists of qualified specialists with many years of experience.

security.title: Safety
security.desc: We use the latest technologies and adhere to the highest standards of hygiene and safety.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: We strive for perfection in every aspect of our work, from diagnostics to treatment.

about.joinThousands: Join thousands of satisfied patients and take care of your smile today!

prices.title: Prices
prices.subtitle: Our prices are transparent and competitive. We offer the highest quality dental services at affordable prices.

GENERIC_ERROR: An error occurred. Please try again.
DAY_HAS_APPOINTMENTS: The day has scheduled appointments and cannot be deleted.
WORKING_HOURS_ALREADY_EXIST: Working hours for this day already exist.
CANNOT_COMPLETE: Cannot save changes for an appointment that is yet to take place.
CANNOT_CANCEL_COMPLETED: Cannot cancel an appointment that has already been completed.
APPOINTMENT_IN_PAST: Appointment cannot be scheduled in the past.
INVALID_WORKING_HOURS_DELETION: Cannot delete working hours that have already passed.
INVALID_WORKING_HOURS_ADDITION: Cannot add working hours in the past.
CANCELLATION_OF_PAST_APPOINTMENT: Cannot cancel an appointment that has already occurred.
